idea-plugin.name: Gradle GUI
idea-plugin.description: This adds graphical Gradle support to Idea. This allows Gradle tasks to be executed via a tree structure showing all available tasks or entering command-line arguments. Frequently-used tasks can be added to the Favorites tab for quicker access. Output is shown in a separate panel allowing the main UI to be vertical and the output to be horizontal. This makes use of the same UI embedded in Gradle itself, but allows editing of .gradle files directly within Idea. This Gradle UI is only displayed for projects that define a Gradle home in Idea's project settings.
